title: The Astonishing Ashtons
creator_credit: Lisa Jane Wallace, John Moore and John Moore Productions
brief_description: For 150 years Ashton’s Circus has criss-crossed Australia, battling floods, high winds and outback roads to bring the magic of the circus to rural and city dwellers alike. This documentary goes behind the greasepaint and spectacle of the circus to provide an insight into the lives of the circus performers and other personnel.
